title: Persigubin Pegunungan Bintang
text: Persatuan Sepak Bola Indonesia Pegunungan Bintang, commonly known as Persigubin Pegunungan Bintang, or Persigubin, is an Indonesian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Bintang%20Mountain%20Regency">Bintang Mountain Regency</a>, <a href="Papua%20%28province%29">Papua</a>. The club plays in the <a href="Liga%203%20%28Indonesia%29">Liga 3</a>.
